name: passninja-guestlist-gas
description: A repository for the PassNinja Google Apps Script demo to demonstrate PassNinja API functionality.

scripts.js2gs: for f in src/*.js; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.js}.gs"; done
scripts.gs2js: for f in src/*.gs; do mv -- "$f" "${f%.gs}.js"; done
scripts.lint:fix: yarn js2gs || yarn gs2js && yarn lint:fix:prettier && yarn js2gs || yarn js2gs
scripts.lint: yarn js2gs || yarn gs2js && yarn lint:prettier && yarn js2gs || yarn js2gs
scripts.build:docs: yarn js2gs || yarn gs2js && yarn build:docs:utils && yarn build:docs:api && yarn build:docs:fns && yarn js2gs || yarn js2gs

hooks.pre-commit: yarn build:docs || yarn lint:fix || git add .

author: PassNinja
